chef.name: Gordon Ramsay
chef.bio: Gordon James Ramsay OBE  (born 8 November 1966) is a British celebrity chef, restaurateur, television personality and writer.

chef.name: Anthony Bourdain
chef.bio: Anthony Michael Bourdain (born June 25, 1956 – June 8, 2018) was an American celebrity chef, author, and travel documentarian[1][2][3] who starred in programs focusing on the exploration of international culture, cuisine, and the human condition

chef.name: Bobby Flay
chef.bio: Robert William Flay (born December 10, 1964), is an American celebrity chef, restaurateur, and reality television personality.

chef.name: Emeril Lagasse
chef.bio: Emeril John Lagassé ( born October 15, 1959)[1] is an American celebrity chef, restaurateur, television personality, cookbook author, and National Best Recipe award winner for his recipe in 2003.

chef.name: Wolfgang Puck
chef.bio: Wolfgang Johannes Puck (born July 8, 1949) is an Austrian-American chef and restaurateur.

chef.name: Julia Child
chef.bio: Julia Child, née Julia Carolyn McWilliams, (born August 15, 1912, Pasadena, California, U.S.—died August 13, 2004, Santa Barbara), American cooking expert.
